title: Manikyam and Polki Pendant - A Regal Telugu Legacy
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Features intricate Polki diamond setting in a floral motif. The central pear-cut ruby adds a touch of regal elegance. Dangles of lustrous cultured pearls enhance its traditional charm. The setting showcases the classic Hyderabadi craftsmanship, ensuring durability and a rich, antique-inspired finish.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant ruby red centerpiece. The Polki diamonds offer a subtle
complemented by the soft white of the pearls.
occasions: or any special occasion where a touch of heritage is desired. Can also be paired with contemporary outfits for a statement look.
description: A timeless piece showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and traditional Telugu design. The combination of Polki diamonds, ruby, and pearls makes it a valuable heirloom. Its Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty and durability. This pendant embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry, making it a treasured addition to any collection.
